Querys.query: select 1 as SEX, sm.ID, sm.DT, sm.REGION_ID, sm.INCOME from PERSON_SEX_M sm union all select 0 as SEX, sg.ID, sg.DT, sg.REGION_ID, sg.INCOME from PERSON_SEX_G sg
insert into PERSON_SEX_M( ID, DT, REGION_ID, INCOME ) values ( ?, ?, ?, ? )
insert into PERSON_SEX_G( ID, DT, REGION_ID, INCOME ) values ( ?, ?, ?, ? )
insert into STAT_REGION( REGION_ID, ALL_PEOPLE, ABLE_BODIED, ABLE_BODIED_PERCENT, INCOME_AVG, INCOME_MAX, JOBLESS, JOBLESS_PERCENT ) values ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
insert into STAT_RU( ALL_PEOPLE, ABLE_BODIED, ABLE_BODIED_PERCENT, INCOME_AVG, INCOME_MAX, JOBLESS, JOBLESS_PERCENT ) values ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
